articles.author: Severin Carrell
articles.title: Drugs deaths in Scotland soar to record level - The Guardian
articles.description: Country has Europe’s worst drugs death rate, more than three-and-a-half times higher than rest of UK
articles.content:
Drugs deaths in Scotland have hit a new record after 1,339 people died last year from overdoses or the cumulative effects of years of addiction.

articles.author: Times Now Digital
articles.title: In another win for Einstein, scientists spot light 'echoing' from behind a black hole for first time - Times Now
articles.description: Researchers used the European Space Agency's XMM-Newton and NASA's NuSTAR space telescopes to locate light behind a black hole that was, reportedly, 10 million times more massive than our own Sun.
articles.content: <ul><li>The pull of a black hole is so strong that it is capable of warping the space around it as well. And it's due to this bizarre phenomenon that astronomers have now caught a glimpse of light be… [+3738 chars]
